author: PAUL WISEMAN
title: Potent protest: Bars drop Russian vodka, promote Ukraine's
Some bars and even state governors are pouring Russian vodka down the drain

sentence: Governors in Utah and New Hampshire ordered government-run liquor stores to pull Russian-made spirits from shelves, while Ohio's governor, Mike DeWine, moved to block the purchase and sale of Russian Standard vodka.
author: Vanessa Romo
title: Stolichnaya Vodka rebrands as 'Stoli,' trying to distance itself from Putin
